WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=60074
 
PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 fails completely with attached file.
 
There is a similar issue for the php-excel-reader project on Google Code:
http://code.google.com/p/php-excel-reader/issues/detail?id=25
 
PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 and php-excel-reader are based on the same library:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/phpexcelreader/
 
so it is not surprising that they share the same bug.
WorkItem.Summary: Excel5 reader OLE read failure with small Mac BIFF5 Excel files

Comments.Message:
There is already a bug report + fix for the PHP-ExcelReader project at SourceForge here:
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=1058233&group_id=99160&atid=623332

Bug is caused by root entry labeled by "R" in BIFF5 on Mac instead of "Root entry".
